Agreement-Type: Vendor
Agreement-Name: Apple
Agreement-FCC: appl

Title: Registry of Apple use of Unicode corporate-zone characters.
Author: Apple Computer, Inc.
Publication-Date: 2005-04-04
URL: ftp://ftp.unicode.org/Public/MAPPINGS/VENDORS/APPLE/CORPCHAR.TXT
Access-Date: 2014-07-04

Title: Map from Mac OS Farsi character set to Unicode 2.1 and later.
Author: Apple Computer, Inc.
Publication-Date: 2005-04-05
URL: ftp://ftp.unicode.org/Public/MAPPINGS/VENDORS/APPLE/FARSI.TXT
Access-Date: 2014-07-04

Title: Map from Mac OS Hebrew character set to Unicode 2.1 and later.
Author: Apple Computer, Inc.
Publication-Date: 2005-04-05
URL: ftp://ftp.unicode.org/Public/MAPPINGS/VENDORS/APPLE/HEBREW.TXT
Access-Date: 2014-07-04

Title: Map from Mac OS Japanese encoding to Unicode 2.1 and later.
Author: Apple Computer, Inc.
Publication-Date: 2005-04-05
URL: ftp://ftp.unicode.org/Public/MAPPINGS/VENDORS/APPLE/JAPANESE.TXT
Access-Date: 2014-07-04

Title: Map from Mac OS Symbol character set to Unicode 4.0 and later.
Author: Apple Computer, Inc.
Publication-Date: 2005-04-05
URL: ftp://ftp.unicode.org/Public/MAPPINGS/VENDORS/APPLE/SYMBOL.TXT
Access-Date: 2014-07-04

Title: Map from Mac OS Thai character set to Unicode 3.2 and later.
Author: Apple Computer, Inc.
Publication-Date: 2005-04-05
URL: ftp://ftp.unicode.org/Public/MAPPINGS/VENDORS/APPLE/THAI.TXT
Access-Date: 2014-07-04
